instructions: Please read these questions along with me and then tell me the numbers of the answers you feel are the most appropriate.

questions.question: Which number from 1 to 7 best describes how likely you would be to buy a pack of these new cigarettes?

scale.1: Definitely would not buy a pack

questions.question: Which number from 1 to 7 best describes your feeling about whether the explanation of the cigarettes was clear/easy to understand or was unclear/hard to understand?
Which number from 1 to 7 best describes how important to you was what they said about the cigarettes?

scale.1: Not at all important to me

questions.question: Do you consider this cigarette to be different than other brands or to be the same as other brands?
Which number from 1 to 7 best describes how believable you feel the statements are about the new cigarettes?

notice: NOTICE IF THE FILM IMAGE IS LESS CLEAR THAN THIS NOTICE IT IS DUE TO THE QUALITY OF THE DOCUMENT BEING USED.
